radiographic_examinations.findings: Lung bases demonstrate subsegmental and segmental atelectasis. The right cardiophrenic angle shows a 1.5 x 2.4 cm soft tissue density lesion. Numerous hypodensities scattered throughout the liver, with the largest being a 1.4 cm hypodensity in segment VII compatible with a simple hepatic cyst. The appendix measures up to 1.4 cm with a hyperemic and thickened wall and significant periappendiceal fat stranding. No evidence of rupture, free air, or organized fluid collections. No pelvic free fluid or lymphadenopathy. Small bilateral fat-containing inguinal hernias.
